title: Dos Classics
content:
Hey, just letting you guys know that I am aware of the problems with the site. Some PHP settings on my server changed, and due to sloppy coding I have to go back and update all of my PHP scripts.

I'm about a third done, I hope to have the rest finished tomorrow, after which I'll ask that anybody post any bugs remaining on the site here.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Dos Classics
content:
It's not a bug, but you could add this [url=http://www.phreak.org/archives/The_Hacker_Chronicles_II/unp4/d210trn.zip]Duke Nukem II trainer module[/url] to your site.Groeten van Frenkel
Visit [url=http://www.sfprod.cjb.net]The Official S&F Prod. Homepage[/url]

title: Re: Dos Classics
content:
Thanks, Frenkel, I'll try to do that soon.

I'm pretty sure I've fixed everything on Dosclassics, so here's where you guys come in. Any bugs you can find, please post here! Also, this topic can function as a general feature/other random stuff request thread for dosclassics, I'd like to clean it up from the mess it has been the past few years.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Dos Classics
content:
Awww, and we thought you'd let it slide!

There should be some mini mods coming up next week.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!

content:
Waaait what? You're returning after all this time to fix dosclassics?

So uh, does password requesting for an account work again?____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: Dos Classics
content:
I'm around, I just don't post as much as I used to.

Anyway, I've fixed up the Keencyclopedia and the game sites, the only thing I know of that's completely broken at the moment is the modification maps, those haven't worked in firefox in ages.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: Dos Classics
content:
It had to be that signature. hadn't it to? Who drew it anyway? I hope it wasn't you.

Oh xtra, thanks a lot, I didn't know you could do it that fast. I've just downloaded the earlier Keen 4 versions from the Official games section. I'll start adding your download links to the KeenWiki for those articles that are missing them, now that everything is back working.
